module.name: Sangoma Property Management
module.description: Sangoma Property Manager is a Property Management System designed specifically for FreePBX and PBXact phone systems. It is utilized via a customized dashboard, provided by the existing User Control Panel (UCP) of FreePBX and PBXact.
module.changelog: *15.0.8* FREEI-66 *15.0.7* FREEI-5885 *15.0.6* FREEI-5458 *15.0.5* FREEI-4971 Unable to run PMS cronjob, getting exception error *15.0.4* FREEI-4148 Move cron jobs to fwconsole job instead of asterisks crontab *15.0.3* FREEI-4350 Added backend validation for validating file format *15.0.2.57* FREEI-4344 seperated ajax request to get room service into new function and called this function after selecting room service *15.0.2.56* FREEI-4343 *15.0.2.55* FREEI-4057 No message in log when billing rate is failed *15.0.2.54* FREEI-3885 FREEI-3886 Fixe unloaded JS file *15.0.2.53* FREEI-3201 FREEPBX-22498 FREEPBX-20334 FREEI-3200 FREEI-3233 FREEI-3314 fixe several bugs.
